title: Confront the Elder Brain
content: save Barcus Wroot in the Blighted Village in Act 1. You then need to help out the enslaved gnomes when you take on True Soul Nere in Grymforge. Later in Act 2, talk to Barcus Wroot in Last Light Inn, and make sure you rescue Wulbren in Moonrise Towers. Halsin: Rescue Halsin in the Goblin Camp during Act 1, then cure the shadow curse in Act 2. (Passive Spirit of the Land - +1 to all ability scores; +2 meters movement range.) Florrick: Rescue Florrick in Act 3. Isobel: Make sure that Isobel stays
